short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: An extension for retrieving the salary range listed for each job on a specific job posting board.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Retrieve the salary range listed for each job on a specific job posting board. 

‚úÖ Save Time: No need to manually research salary ranges.
üìä Make Informed Decisions: View accurate salary ranges directly from job postings to assess opportunities.
üíº Transparency in Job Listings: Understand employer expectations and compensation trends effortlessly.
‚öôÔ∏è Easy to Use: Once installed, the extension works quietly in the background, enhancing your job search experience.

Whether you're exploring new career opportunities or evaluating job offers, Job-S Salary provides vital insights to make your job search more strategic and effective. With support for the Philippines, Singapore, Australia, Malaysia, and Indonesia this tool helps you access salary information across key employment markets, broadening your search possibilities.

- Switched to Plasmo
- Added supported countries: Malaysia and Indonesia
